Description: Fragment (mended from three fragments) of foot and floor of short-stemmed Attic black glaze pottery cup; convex foot with shallow groove on outer face; glazed black on interior and exterior; reserved: outer face of foot, resting surface and centre of stem on interior; inscription cut on underside.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Inside the temenos.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXV, no. 685)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1605)
